trans:
ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Introduce the concept of extracting information through an escape room scenario-based game.
ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Analyze the article "The Pigeon Moves House". Step 1, read the question and underline the keywords in the prompt. Step 2, guide students to identify the four key elements in the article and encourage them to express these in complete sentences. Step 3, use the keywords in the question to locate relevant parts in the article, finding similar or identical content. Step 4, connect the context to complete the answers as required.
ğŸ‘‰ğŸ» Analyze the reading passage "Releasing Dragonflies" and apply the newly learned information extraction method to complete three practice questions.
